summary: A wandering mystical doctor passes through remote regions of Japan uncovering supernatural creatures called the Mushi and curing people of their effects.
cast: Joe Odagiri|Nao Ohmori|Yû Aoi|Lily|Makiko Kuno|Reia Moriyama|Hideyuki Inada|Aaron Dismuke|Greg Dulcie|Juli Erickson|Makiko Esumi|Todd Haberkorn|Grant James|Mike McFarland|Rô Naruse|Baku Numata|Ichi Omiya|Reisen Ri|Christopher Sabat|Jennifer Seman|Stephanie Sheh|Mark Stoddard|Alison Viktorin|Travis Willingham|Stephanie Young
title: Mushishi
